<url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;d9c077c3.1501">   <title>Extended deadline for "Academic Communication in Multimedia Environment" propsals </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;d9c077c3.1501</link>   <description> Sorry for cross-posting. Please circulate.<br><br>Call for papers: Academic Communication in Multimedia Environment<br><br>The research team of the ACiME (Academic Communication in Multimedia<br>Environment) project is pleased to announce the international conference<br>&quot;Academic Communication in Multimedia Environment&quot;, which will be held<br>in Sofia, Bulgaria, on 12-14 September 2015.<br><br>Confirmed keynote speakers are:<br><br>Prof. Dr. Angelika Storrer, Germany - &quot;From linked data to digital<br>genres: text-linguistic approaches to multimodal hypertext analysis&quot;<br>Prof. Dr. Diane Pecorari, Sweden - &quot;Irreconcilable differences? On<br>plagiarism and other intertextualities in academic communication&quot;<br>Prof. Dr. Klaus Schneider, Germany - ''Quoting Practices in Academia''<br>Prof. Dr. Irena Vassileva, [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-22T14:31:46+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Esther Breuer</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;d9c077c3.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;3482d45d.1501">   <title>Conference on Teaching English, Language, and Literacy in the Primary Curriculum 9 March 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;3482d45d.1501</link>   <description> Please find attached details of a conference on &quot;Teaching English, Language, and Literacy in the Primary Curriculum&quot; to be held on 9th March 2015 at UCL Institute of Education, London.<br><br>For enquiries please contact: Tracy Modha (T.Modha@ioe.ac.uk)    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T18:20:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Galbraith D.W.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;3482d45d.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;53270a88.1501">   <title>SIG Writing Newsletter Winter 2014/2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;53270a88.1501</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>please find attached the Winter 2014/2015 newsletter of SIG Writing with<br>information about events, publications, members, and resources.<br><br>Happy reading from Stuttgart!<br><br>Cerstin    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-14T16:26:01+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Cerstin Mahlow</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;53270a88.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;747c7892.1412">   <title>Call for papers: Special Issue on Writing Instruction across the World </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;747c7892.1412</link>   <description> Call for papers: Special Issue on Writing Instruction across the World.<br><br>Guest editors: Steve Graham and Gert Rijlaarsdam<br><br>Steve Graham and Gert Rijlaarsdam are guest editors of a special issue of Reading &amp; Writing focusing on writing instruction across the world. This is an open call for submissions to the special issue. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-23T17:26:45+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Galbraith D.W.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;747c7892.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;abefb5cd.1412">   <title>Final reminder: Dartmouth Summer Seminar deadline 12/15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;abefb5cd.1412</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;abefb5cd.1412">Final reminder: Dartmouth Summer Seminar deadline 12/15 </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-12-08T13:11:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Christiane K. Donahue</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;abefb5cd.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;ec175f25.1412">   <title>Call for papers: Special Issue on Writing Instruction across the World </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;ec175f25.1412</link>   <description> Call for papers: Special Issue on Writing Instruction across the World.<br><br>Guest editors: Steve Graham and Gert Rijlaarsdam<br><br>Steve Graham and Gert Rijlaarsdam are guest editors of a special issue of Reading & Writing focusing on writing instruction across the world. This is an open call for submissions to the special issue. Submitted papers must be a study examining writing practices or the teaching of writing in one or more countries. The paper must focus on writing instruction at one or more grades from grades 1 to 12. All papers will undergo peer review and must be submitted to Reading [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-06T12:41:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Galbraith D.W.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;ec175f25.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;7be9d0ff.1412">   <title>SIG Writing newsletter Winter 2014/2015: call for news </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;7be9d0ff.1412</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>we are already in the last month of 2014. Let's see what we have<br>accomplished since the SIG Writing Conference in August.<br><br>For the Winter 2014/2015 edition of the SIG Writing Newsletter to appear<br>in mid December 2014, I am looking for news. Please send me a note, if<br>you have information to share like: [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-01T14:59:44+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Cerstin Mahlow</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;7be9d0ff.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;79bd97a4.1411">   <title>Reminder: deadline December 15 Dartmouth Summer Seminar applications </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;79bd97a4.1411</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;79bd97a4.1411">Reminder: deadline December 15 Dartmouth Summer Seminar applications </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-11-16T19:16:16+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Christiane K. Donahue</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;79bd97a4.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;2ab182a.1409">   <title>save the dates: Dartmouth Summer Research Seminar </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;2ab182a.1409</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;2ab182a.1409">save the dates: Dartmouth Summer Research Seminar </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-09-16T23:11:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Christiane K. Donahue</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;2ab182a.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;55dd436a.1408">   <title>SIG-Writing Summer 2014 newsletter </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;55dd436a.1408</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>please find attached the Summer 2014 newsletter of SIG Writing with<br>information about events, publications, projects, and a new COST action.<br><br>Happy reading from Stuttgart!<br><br>Cerstin<br><br>PS: Contributions for the Fall/Winter edition 2014 can be emailed to me<br>by November 15, 2014 (cerstin@mahlow.ch). Please include your<br>contribution in the mail text, do not send Word documents.    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-18T11:42:43+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Cerstin Mahlow</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;55dd436a.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;54b0c36c.1407">   <title>SIG Writing newsletter Summer 2014: call for news </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;54b0c36c.1407</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>finally, Summer is there! Teaching is (almost) over and preparations<br>for our SIG Writing Conference are in place.<br><br>For the Summer edition of the SIG Writing Newsletter to appear in mid<br>August 2014, I am looking for news. Please send me a note, if you have<br>information to share like:<br><br>- conferences, workshops, or training schools coming up, including calls<br>for papers/participation/proposals<br>- start or end of a research project<br>- upcoming book publications (if allowed to be published, send a<br>cover image, too)<br>- finished PhD thesis (preferably with a link to the thesis or to the<br> [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-21T14:55:40+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Cerstin Mahlow</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;54b0c36c.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;472b1023.1406">   <title>IAIMTE 2015 conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;472b1023.1406</link>   <description> International Association for the Improvement of Mother Tongue Education<br><br>Dear colleague,<br><br>It is a great pleasure to invite you to participate in the 10th IAIMTE&lt;http://www.iaimte.com/&gt; conference which will take place on June 3-5 2015 at the University of Southern Denmark, Odense, Denmark. Please, find all relevant information on the conference website&lt;http://www.sdu.dk/om_sdu/institutter_centre/ikv/konferencer/konferencer+2015/iaimte&gt;.<br><br>The bi-annual IAIMTE conferences are successful because of their relatively small scale, the high level of social interaction, and the diverse range of languages and educational cultures represented. The 2015 conference builds on these strengths to create a context where researchers and teacher educators meet to share their research. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-20T15:24:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Galbraith D.W.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;472b1023.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;d2076e1f.1406">   <title>Call for Organizing SIG Writing 2016 International Conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;d2076e1f.1406</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>We are looking for a willing team, a wonderful location, and convenient facilities to host our SIG Writing 2016 International Conference! Please visit our website (http://www.sig-writing.org) to learn more and state your intention to host our most important event, by mail to the SIG Writing coordinators, until July 18. You will surely want to add your location to the iconic sentence &quot;Following successful meetings in Padua, Paris, Freiburg, Utrecht, Barcelona, Poitiers, Verona, Stafford, Geneva, Antwerp, Lund, Heidelberg, Porto and Amsterdam, we are pleased to invite you to ...&quot; [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-09T19:48:01+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Galbraith D.W.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;d2076e1f.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;b1a65ab8.1406">   <title>Conference Announcement and CFP - SILE 2015 - Canada </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;b1a65ab8.1406</link>   <description> EVENT: SILE 2015 - Canada<br><br>Co-organized by the University of Sherbrooke (Canada), the Escola Superior de Educa\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdo de Lisboa (Portugal) and the University of Paris-Est Cr\ufffd\ufffdteil (France), the next International Symposium on Educational Literacy (ISEL/ Symposium International sur la Litt\ufffd\ufffdracie \ufffd\ufffd l'Ecole - SILE) will be held in Canada in 2015. The call for proposals is open - deadline 15 september 2014. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-05T10:10:08+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Galbraith D.W.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;b1a65ab8.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;1205b1d9.1405">   <title>'Early bird\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd registration for the 15th biennial Writing Development in Higher Education (WDHE) Conference has been extended until Friday, 23rd May!</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;1205b1d9.1405</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>‘Early bird’ registration for the 15th biennial Writing Development in Higher Education (WDHE) Conference has been extended until Friday, 23rd May!<br><br>The WDHE Network’s listserv and biennial conference have been integral to charting the development of Academic Writing pedagogy and theory in UK universities, and this year’s conference, hosted by the Centre for Academic Writing at Coventry University, will celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the Founding of the WDHE Network. The conference will provide an important opportunity to reflect on how and why the field of Academic Writing has grown, and to consider national and international collaborations with [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-21T06:39:01+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Lisa Ganobcsik-Williams</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;1205b1d9.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;84095a9.1405">   <title>FW: 'Early Bird' registration for the UK's 15th biennial Writing Development in Higher Education (WDHE) Conference ends this Friday! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;84095a9.1405</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>This is a reminder that 'early bird' registration for the 15th biennial Writing Development in Higher Education (WDHE) Conference ends this Friday, 16th May!<br><br>The WDHE Network's listserv and biennial conference have been integral to charting the development of Academic Writing pedagogy and theory in UK universities, and this year's conference, hosted by the Centre for Academic Writing at Coventry University, will celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the Founding of the WDHE Network. The conference will provide an important opportunity to reflect on how and why the field of Academic Writing has grown, and to consider national and [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-13T07:25:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Lisa Ganobcsik-Williams</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;84095a9.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;963adaf9.1405">   <title>Last call: international higher education writing research workshop proposals </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;963adaf9.1405</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;963adaf9.1405">Last call: international higher education writing research workshop proposals </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-05-02T00:24:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Christiane K. Donahue</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;963adaf9.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;523e0463.1404">   <title>EWCA conference - Early bird reminder and additional information </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EARLI-SIG-WRITING;523e0463.1404</link>   <description> *apologies for cross-postings*<br>Dear all,<br><br>We would like to take the opportunity to point out the Early Bird<br>registration deadline for reduced conference fees -*May **16th 2014 *-<br>for the EWCA 2014 conference in Frankfurt (Oder). You can register<br>online www.ewca14.eu &lt;http://www.ewca14.eu&gt;<br><br>Moreover, we would like to share the following information with you:<br><br>* /*Discovering Poland*/<br><br>We are happy to inform you that now we can provide you with more<br>information on the Poland trip after the conference organised by &quot;Marco<br>der Pole &lt;http://www.marcoderpole.com.pl/index.php?id=kraj&amp;kraj=1&gt;&quot;:<br>*One-week-roundtrip: discover Poland - Poland Study Tour! Those interested in applying for a Dr. Joshi Travel Grant should send a cover letter, including a brief description of travel expenditure, and a short CV no later than April 30 to Rui A. Alves (ralves@fpce.up.pt&lt;mailto:ralves@fpce.up.pt&gt;).
